name: ai.cerb.automationBuilder.action.recordUpdate
script:
start:
  await/type:
    form:
      elements:
        sheet/prompt_record_type:
          label: Record Type:
          required@bool: yes
          data:
            automation:
              uri: cerb:automation:cerb.data.record.types
              inputs:
          limit: 15
          schema:
            layout:
              headings@bool: no
              paging@bool: yes
              filtering@bool: yes
            columns:
              selection/uri:
                params:
                  mode: single
              text/label_singular:
                params:
                  bold@bool: yes

  await/fields:
    form:
      elements:
        sheet/prompt_record_fields:
          label: Record Fields:
          data:
            automation:
              uri: cerb:automation:cerb.data.record.fields
              inputs:
                of: {{prompt_record_type}}
          limit: 15
          schema:
            layout:
              headings@bool: no
              paging@bool: yes
              filtering@bool: yes
              title_column: _key
            columns:
              selection/key:
                params:
                  mode: multiple
              text/_key:
                params:
                  bold@bool: yes
                  value_key: key
                  icon:
                    image_template@raw: {{is_required ? 'asterisk'}}
              text/type:
              text/notes:

  return:
    snippet@text:
      {% set record_uri = prompt_record_type %}
      record.update/{{random_string(6)|lower}}:
        output: updated_{{record_uri}}
        inputs:
          # See: https://cerb.ai/docs/automations/commands/record.update/
          record_type: {{record_uri}}
          # [TODO] Set `record_id:`
          #record_id: 123
          fields:
            {% for field in prompt_record_fields -%}
            {{field}}:
            {% endfor %}
            
        #on_simulate:
        #on_success:
        #on_error:
